title: Kalyanamthan Kattikittu Lyrics Saamy
stanzas: <div>Kalyanamthan Kattikittu Song Lyrics Saamy

Kalyanamthaan kattikittu
oadi polamaa
illai oadipoyi kalyanamthaan
kattikalamaa

thaliyathaan kattikittu
peththukalamaa
illa pulla kutti peththukittu
kattikalaama

saamburani vaasathula
valarntha sirukki ne
ada sagunam parthu
sadangu paarthu
siricha kirikki nee

saamikellaam sagunam
yaedhu thaevaiyillaiye
nee saaku poakku
solvathellaam niyaayam illaiye

adiye Kalyanamthaan kattikittu
oadi polamaa
illai oadipoyi kalyanamthaan
kattikalamaa

thaliyathaan kattikittu
peththukalamaa
illa pulla kutti peththukittu
kattikalaama

rusiya paakura
rusiya pesura
rusiya samayalu
seiviyaa nee

pasumpaal neiyyila
thuvaram paruppa
kadanji thaalichu
kodukkatumaa

paththiya soara
naan unna kaeten
kaaranjaaramaa
unaku samikka theriyumaa
emmaa

melagula rasama
molagaa thokka
nalla seiyyuven
nee saappitu paaru

nandu varukka theriyuma
kozhi porikka theriyuma
aattu nasukki poatu
sooppu vaikka theriyumaa

yaen iduppu oaramaa
irukku thaiyaa karamaa
kandu neeyum pudichita
eduthukaiyaa thaaraalamaa

Kalyanamthaan kattikittu
oadi polamaa
illai oadipoyi kalyanamthaan
kattikalamaa

thaliyathaan kattikittu
peththukalamaa
illa pulla kutti peththukittu
kattikalaama

ooru oaramaa
ayyanar pola nee
meesaiya kaatti nee
meratturiye

kunji porichidum
kozhiya pola nee
veliya thaanda anjuriye

thaedhiya vachithaan
paakkaiyum maathunaa(2)
ellaiya thaanudven
un ishtam polathaan

panguni varattum
parisal thaaren
adhukku munnaala
konjam adjust pannudi.

manja poosi kulichita
manasukulla verkkudhu
unna naanum paarthutaa
udambu muzhukka koosudhu

vendhaiyatha arachithaan
thaeichivida varattumaa
vidiya vidiya unakuthan
thalaiyanaiya irukkatuma

Kalyanamthaan kattikittu
oadi polamaa
illai oadipoyi kalyanamthaan
kattikalamaa

thaliyathaan kattikittu
peththukalamaa
illa pulla kutti peththukittu
kattikalaama

saamburani vaasathula
valarntha sirukki ne
ada sagunam parthu
sadangu paarthu
siricha kirikki nee

saamikellaam sagunam
yaedhu thaevaiyillaiye
nee saaku poakku
solvathellaam niyaayam illaiye

oru thaliyathaan kattikittu
peththukalamaa
pala pulla kutti peththukittu
kattikalaama
